title: Eclectic Ny Style Studio! ALL UTILITIES INC!
map_address: 357 s Alvarado St near Maryland st
posting_body: ['Call/ text Alex:', 'show contact info', 'to schedule a showing!', 'We have absolutely beautiful STUDIOS apartments, available now, STARTING AT $1,525.00 per month with a one year lease.', 'All Utilities are included except internet & cable!!', 'This building is in the heart of L.A!', 'Walking distance from everything!!', 'Near LACC, Southwestern University, grocery stores, night life, L.A. Live, Staples Center and much more!!', 'Great for those who love the city life and appreciate New York style apartments.', 'This location is a walkers paradise which means most daily errands do not require a car.', 'The closest transit routes are the Alvarado/ Maryland Bus stop & Westlake Mccarther park train station', 'Most units include full bathrooms, exposed brick walls, closets & hardwood floors.', 'The apartments are unfurnished.', 'ALL UTILITIES INCLUDED!!', 'The building has an elevator, on site laundry and intercom access.', 'There is no parking but there are several public garages that offer monthly services nearby.', 'Requirements- no history of evictions and must have a credit score of at least 600.', 'Co-signers welcome.', '2x monthly rent.', '2 people max', 'To apply, the first application is $25, any additional will be $15 each.', 'Copies of ID’s per applicant and 2 recent paystubs per applicant are needed.']
